Filling a police report will require the store employee to attend whenever is needed.

 

As for the insurance claim, I’m looping @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  to advise.

 

Regards,

From: Andrea Calapati <Andrea.Calapati@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2025 10:40 AM
To: Lina El Moabbi <Lina.Elmoabbi@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Retail Operations QAT <Retail.Operations.QAT@chalhoub.com>; Anastasiia Sitkina <Anastasiia.Sitkina@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Focus Incident INC#158807 Swarovski - Place Vendome (Theft)
Importance: High

 

Hello Lina,

 

We have a theft case confirmed in Swarovski Vendome, kindly see attached details. Footage is available with me.

May we know if there is a possibility to only file police report, without pursuing charges / court case – as in the past store leader is being obliged by authorities as representative, resulting to loss of time on shopfloor.

Instead can we claim the RSP value: 810 QAR via insurance?

 

Thank you,

Andrea

ANDREA CALAPATI

MANAGER ‑ RSO

QATAR LUXURY CO. WLL

DOHA

‑

QATAR

‑

	
 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 

‑

CAREERS.CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

 <https://twitter.com/ChalhoubGroup>

From: Andrea Calapati <Andrea.Calapati@chalhoub.com>
To: Lina El Moabbi <Lina.Elmoabbi@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

--------------------------------------------------
Hello Lina,

 

Thank you, yes understood it is still required to have store representative to file the police report

and then we can use the police report as part of insurance claim, without pressing further charges or opening court case so that store team does not need to spend further time – is that possible?

 

We will await for Hagop’s advice for insurance claim.

 

Best regards,

Andrea

Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2025 12:31 PM
To: Andrea Calapati <Andrea.Calapati@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Retail Operations QAT <Retail.Operations.QAT@chalhoub.com>; Anastasiia Sitkina <Anastasiia.Sitkina@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: Focus Incident INC#158807 Swarovski - Place Vendome (Theft)

 

You are missing the point, once a claim is submitted to the police every time the store employee will need to go to the police for further investigation. We cannot just say we need only a report for XYZ reasons.

 

Let’s see what Hagop will say if this claim is worth it.

 

Regards,

 

LINA EL MOABBI

QATAR LUXURY CO. WLL

DOHA
